about_the_game: Get ready to experience the most unforgettable moments in the military conscription. This game is the true military life simulator! It doesn't matter whether you have experienced the army or not. You will feel either nostalgy or learn new military related lollapalooza. The game is intended to be a humorous parody of the military service and may not teach real military tactics or strategies on any level.
